news.content: My paper titled "LITE: Light Inception with boosTing tEchniques for Time Series Classification" was accepted at the 10th IEEE International Conference on Data Science and Advanced Analytics (DSAA) in the Learning from Temporal Data (LearnTeD) special session track.

My paper titled "ShapeDBA: Generating Effective Time Series Prototypes using ShapeDTW Barycenter Averaging" was accepted at the 8th Workshop on Advanced Analytics and Learning on Temporal Data (AALTD) in conjuction with the next European Conference on Machine Learning and Principles and Practice of Knowledge Discovery in Databases (ECML/PKDD).
I was elected as a council member of the IRIMAS laboratory.

In Lisbon Portugal to present my paper titled "Enhancing Time Series Classification with Self-Supervised Learning" at the 15th Internation Conference on Agents and Artificial Intelligence (ICAART 20223).
In Osaka Japan to present my paper at the IEEE Internation Conference on Big Data.
My paper titled Enhancing Time Series Classification with Self-Supervised Learning is accepted at the 2023 Internation Conference on Agents and Artificial Intelligence (ICAART 20223) !
My paper titled Deep Learning For Time Series Classification Using New Hand-Crafted Convolution Filters is accepted at the 2022 IEEE Conference on Big Data !
I started my PhD on the DELEGATION project at IRIMAS, UHA under the supervision of Dr. Maxime DEVANNE, Dr. Jonathan WEBER and Prof. Germain FORESTIER.
I graduated from Telecom Paris, Institut Polytechnique de Paris with my Masters program MICAS with highest honors.
I graduated from the Lebanese University Faculty of Engineering with a Bachelor Degree in Telecommunication and Electrical Engineering.
Started my Master's internship at IRIMAS, UHA about Time Series Analysis with Depp Learning models.
Started my Master year 2 at Telecom Paris, Institur Polytechnique de Paris in the MICAS: Machine Learning, Communication and Security program.
Started an internsip with IRIMAS, UHA about Deep Learning models for Time Series Classification.
